mapper.select: SELECT mining_district_id, name, region, ST_AsText(ST_Simplify(geom, 5000)) AS wkt FROM mining_district ORDER BY LOWER(name)

SELECT DISTINCT md.mining_district_id, md.name, md.region FROM borehole AS bh JOIN borehole_geom AS bg ON bg.borehole_id = bh.borehole_id JOIN mining_district AS md ON ST_Intersects(md.geom, bg.geom) WHERE bh.prospect_id = #{id}
